text: Nongtyngur is a village in the East Khasi Hills District of the Indian state of Meghalaya.Government of Meghalaya, Department of Agriculture Nongtyngur village is 30 kilometers from Pynursla. There are views over the plain of Bangladesh. Nearby villages are Lyngkhat, Rimassar, Nongkyndah, Mawlynnong, and Nohwet. ==References== Category:Villages in East Khasi Hills district
title: Nongtyngur
